text: "Our Choice" is a song performed by Ari Ólafsson, who represented Iceland in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018. At the first semi final of the Eurovision Song Contest 2018, the song was performed second in the running order, following Azerbaijan, and preceding Albania. The song received 15 points from the jury vote, but none from the public televote, placing 19th and failing to qualify for the final. ==References== Category:Eurovision songs of Iceland Category:Eurovision songs of 2018
title: Our Choice (song)
